message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its high quality and unique features, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $13,500. We understand its worth to you is $12,000, but we hope this offer presents a favorable opportunity for both parties. Should you have any questions or need further details, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response.
